日期： Thu, 1 Feb 2024 16:57:34 +0800

春節假期期間境外生優惠借書~~

1、圖書館將於春節假期前三天(113.2.5(一)起)開放境外生可借「限館內閱覽」館藏，到期日為開館日再加一天(113.2.19(一))。

2、一般館藏可借冊數提高至50冊。
欲申請者，請於(113.2.5(一)~113.2.7(三)圖書館開館期間，至服務櫃台辦理。

圖書館敬上


The preferential book loan for foreign students during the Spring Festival holiday.

1. The library will open three days before the Spring Festival holiday (from 2/5) for foreign students to borrow the "Library Reading Only" collections. The expiration date is the opening day plus one day (2/19).

2. The number of books that can be borrowed in general collections is increased to 50.
To apply, please go to the service counter during the library opening period from 2/5-7.

Sincerely,
Office of Library and Information Services
National Dong Hwa University
